title: If I am gaining 20 points for winning and losing 20 points for being defeated
body: Does it mean i reached my peak in rankeds ? (currently silver 3)

replies.body: According to your mmr, you are where you should be. Here is where you should start focussing on improving yourself and playing some normals before hopping into ranked to make sure your internet and frame of mind are at their best.
Thank you @ZEZOCKARY i accept that and i will work on it

i don't think it's that easily summed up.

When you're beat, was it just a fluke and the enemy got lucky?  
Or will you learn and adapt to better yourself against players who outskill you?

When I feel I can't climb anymore, I try to keep these questions in mind.  One is the correct way of thinking, even though I want to believe the other.

to be honest i feel like i have alot of gaps where i can improve, i just dont know how to  do so :\ 

+ my mechanics are so bad that i lost hope on working on them (that is obvious if you look at my match history :P)

i will work on the others 

Thank you @soraka
